title: No keyboard input in TigerVNC(Java) when embedded/integrated in window
author: demirdag
body_snippet:
<!--- Provide a general summary of the issue in the Title above -->

## Expected Behavior
I have an SSH session to my linux machine at home. I also forward tcp5900 over my ssh session and connect to VNC on my home-linux machine. Normal operation would be that I can embed the VNC (java) client into mRemoteNG and work with that. 

This all works perfectly except for the fact that I cannot use the keyboard in the embedded VNC session. Everything BUT embedded in mRemoteNG and the keyboard input...

comments.author: robertpopa22
comments.snippet: Triage refresh (P2): this issue has been inactive for a long time. Please retest on the latest build and share reproducible steps, expected vs actual behavior, and logs/screenshots. If there is no confirmation/update, maintainers can close it as stale or not reproducible.
